DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see oral sucrose solution comfort premature infant necessary eye exam . The investigator believe use solution prior eye exam lead decrease pain measure rise heart rate fall oxygen saturation . In addition lead decrease event 12 hour follow examination . Events include episodes infant temporarily stop breathing , drop heart rate , drop oxygen level .
DOC.brief_title: Use Sucrose Relieve Pain During Eye Exams Infants
DOC.criteria: All premature infant admit Neonatal Intensive Care Unit require serial dilated examination ass retinopathy prematurity candidate study . This include infant birthweight less 1500 g infant 1500 g 2000 g require supplemental oxygen . Any infant unable safely suckle 0.5 cc fluid exclude study . This include infant maintain ventilator serious gastrointestinal complication may exacerbate oral fluid bolus . Any infant maintain narcotic reason eligible study . All infant major congenital anomaly exclude .
